Scaling the 2D embeddings

Source: R/data_preprocessing.R
generate_scaled_data.Rd

This function scales the 2D embeddings.

Usage

generate_scaled_data(nldr_df, x = "UMAP1", y = "UMAP2")

Arguments

nldr_df

A data frame containing 2D embeddings.

x

The name of the column that contains first 2D embeddings component.

y

The name of the column that contains second 2D embeddings component.

Value

A list contains scaled 2D embeddings.

Examples

generate_scaled_data(nldr_df = s_curve_noise_umap, x = "UMAP1", y = "UMAP2")
#> $scaled_UMAP1
